author: passthenachos
title: Content Synchronization using Audio
description: Media is often reused in many small pieces. Content rights holders need a way to validate consumption of their media in distributed networks
solution: Whisper fingerprints media to min-hashes allowing the identification of the asset from client node fingerprints to create sync and lookup
experience: The founding team holds over 20 US patents, 2 Technical Emmys, 1 Oscar, Multiple exits, existing web 2.0 Series B funded with A list clients
